about_the_game:
The immensely popular fictional railway “Kowa Railway,” known from YouTube, is finally becoming a game!!

Enjoy completely freeform driving with:

  • No scoring!

  • No automatic braking!

  • Total freedom to operate as you like!

    Two Modes to Choose From

    Free Driving Mode

    Stop or pass stations at will, open the doors, play onboard announcements—do whatever you like!

    Ultra High-Speed Mode

    Experience breakneck speeds soaring past 1,000 km/h!

Boasting a total of 500,000 views on YouTube, Kowa Railway is now yours to explore in a fresh, new kind of train-driving experience!

We want as many people as possible to enjoy our games, so all MFC STUDIO titles are freely available for streaming and video content. If you have any questions or issues while streaming, feel free to contact @Shinise3 on X.

Video & Streaming Guidelines

  • Anyone—individuals or companies—can stream or post videos without needing prior approval.

  • Monetization is allowed.

  • If possible, please include the game’s name in your video/stream title or provide a link to the Steam page in your description.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The popular imaginary railway “Kowa Railway” from YouTube is finally making its game debut! Experience its 11-station route in realistic free driving mode or by blasting past 1,000 km/h in high-speed mode. Enjoy every inch of this dynamic line as you operate your train your way!
